articles.description: But Anthony Fauci, the U.S.’s top-infectious-disease expert, says the emergent flu is not ‘an immediate threat’
articles.content: An emergent strain of flu in China is attracting the attention of scientists just as the world is wrestling with the worst pandemic since the 1918 Spanish flu. Chinese researchers identified a novel … [+2161 chars]
